document_data.name: ''Blade of Venom''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Blades of venom''''' were fairly common enchanted [[short sword]]s in [[Myth Drannor]] before the [[Weeping War]].
document_data.Description: ''Blades of venom'' appeared inconspicuous, not showing their deadly enchantment that coated the edge of the sword with magic poison.
document_data.Powers: ''Blades of venom's'' enchantment added additional poison damaged upon hit.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], during the [[Cult of the Dragon]]'s occupation of the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]], some of these swords could be found among disturbed and looted graves of the [[Dwarven Dungeons]]. One could be found inside a chest in the [[Halls of Stone]] and another in the [[Deep Halls]] among the ruins of an old war-time infirmary.
